sentences.sContent: The new laws will be just as oppressive as those they replace.
sentences.sCn: 新法律将跟被它所取代的那些法律一样不公正。

synos.tran: 压迫的；沉重的；压制性的；难以忍受的

remMethod.val: 来自oppress (v. 压迫， 压抑)

words.tran: 压抑；镇压；压迫手段；沉闷；苦恼
压迫，压抑；使……烦恼；使……感到沉重

trans.tranCn: 压迫的；沉重的；压制性的；难以忍受的
trans.tranOther: If you describe a society, its laws, or customs as oppressive, you think they treat people cruelly and unfairly
